name: Bloodsapper
movement: walking speed of 40 feet and climbing speed of 20 feet
description: The Bloodsapper is a medium-sized aberration characterized by its chaotic evil nature. It possesses sharp claws and a long, lashing tongue used for draining life from its prey.
memorable: Its unique ability to detect blood from 240 feet away enables it to track weakened foes, making it a relentless hunter.
goals: The Bloodsapper seeks to drain the life from weakened creatures, exploiting injuries to sustain itself.
relations: Often encountered in the company of other predators or as a servant of darker forces.
environment: Typically found in dark, secluded areas where it can ambush wounded creatures.
strengths: High mobility with good hit points, and excellent tracking abilities due to Blood Scent.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma limit its strategic capabilities and magical interactions.
attacks: The Bloodsapper uses melee claw attacks and a Draining Tongue that latches onto targets to drain health.
most_powerful_ability: Bloody Breath creates a damaging and poisoning effect, making it a dangerous area attack.
senses: The Bloodsapper can smell blood within 240 feet, significantly enhancing its tracking capabilities.
skills: It has good stealth and perception skills, aiding in ambush tactics against injured prey.
additional_information: Has a powerful Draining Tongue that can attach to targets and drain life over time.
Regrows its severed tongue after a long rest or upon reducing a creature to 0 hp.
Can utilize offensive abilities and mobility to maintain pressure in combat.
